Spells:
Color Spray (W1 Illu): R15' cone targets with 2/4/any HD unconscious 2d4 rd/blind 1d4 rd/stunned 1 rd (DC 12 Will neg)
Detect Poison (W0 Divi): R45' Detects poison in target, DC20 Alchemy check for type
Detect Scrying (W4 Divi): R40' Detects scrying, opposed caster check to see source
False Life (W2 Necr): Self +1d10+8 temporary HP for 8 hr
Fire Shield (W4 Evoc): Cold or hot flames enveloping self do d6+8 HP upon foe hit, take half HP from heat or cold attacks (DC 15 Ref no HP) for 8 rd
Flare (W0 Evoc): R45' Target dazzled 1 min (DC 11 Fort neg)

Ghoul Touch (W2 Necr): Touched paralyzed 1d6+2 rd and stench sickens 10' radius (DC 17 Fort neg)
Glitterdust (W2 Conj): R180' Creatures in 10'-radius outlined and blind for 8 rd (DC 13 Will neg)
Grease (W1 Conj): R45' Object or 10' square slippery (DC 12 Ref or fall) for 8 min
Hold Portal (W1 Abju): R180' Door, gate, or window locked, +5 DC to open for 8 min
Invisibility Sphere (W3 Illu): Creatures w/in 10' of touched invisible for 8 min or until attacks or leave area
Locate Object (W2 Divi): R720' Sense direction of object or type for 8 min
Magic Aura (W1 Illu): Alters aura of target object le 40 lb for 8 dy
Magic Circle Against Law (W3 Abju): 10' radius from touched +2 AC, +2 saves, extra save vs. mental control, no contact vs. lawful creatures for 80 min
Magic Weapon (W1 Tran): Touched weapon +1 attack and damage for 8 min
Prestidigitation (W0 Univ): R10' Perform minor tricks for 1 hr
Protection From Energy (W3 Abju): Touched ignores up to 96 HP from specified energy for 80 min
Protection From Evil (W1 Abju): Touched +2 AC, +2 saves, extra save vs. mental control, no contact by evil creatures for 8 min
Read Magic (W0 Divi): Self read magical writing

Remove Curse (W4 Abju): Dispels all curses from touched
Shield (W1 Abju): Self +4 AC, block magic missile for 8 min
Magic Notes:
Greater Spell Focus (Necromancy): +3 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Craft Wondrous Item: Create and mend miscellaneous magic items
Create Portal: Create magical portal
Delay Spell: Delay effect of spell 1-5 rd
Extend Spell: x2 chosen spell duration uses +1 spell slot
Greater Spell Penetration: +2 caster level vs. resistance checks
Improved Counterspell: Counter using higher-level spell from same school
Innate Spell: Designated spells as spell-like ability 1/rd uses +8 spell slot
Insidious Magic: DC 9+foe level check to detect Weave magic, Foe DC 19 check to detect Shadow Weave spell
Magical Artisan: Reduce item creation base price by 25%
Pernicious Magic: Weave foes DC 19 check to counterspell, DC 9+foe level to counterspell Weave foes
Persistent Spell: Fixed-range spell lasts 24 hr
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Shadow Weave Magic: +1 DC and resistance checks on enchantment, illusion, necromancy, and darkness descriptor spells, -1 caster level on evocation and transmutation, no light descriptor spells
Signature Spell: Convert arcane spells into specified mastered spell
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Spell Mastery: Prepare 1 spells w/out spellbook
Spell Penetration: +2 checks to overcome spell resistance
Spellcasting Prodigy (Wizard): +1 spell DC/+2 intelligence for bonus spells
Still Spell: Cast spell w/out movement uses +1 spell slot
Tenacious Magic: Weave foes DC 23 to dispel, DC 13+foe level to dispel Weave foes
Twin Spell: Affect as two spells uses +4 spell slot
